content.title: Post Graduate Scholarship Scheme for GATE/GPAT Qualified Students-AICTE
content.details: AICTE awards Post Graduate Scholarship of ₹12,400/- per month to full-time GATE/CEED qualified students admitted to AICTE approved post-graduate programs in AICTE approved Institutions/ University Departments.
benefits: Financial assistance for full-time GATE/CEED qualified students
eligibility: Having a valid GATE/CEED score at the time of admission
Must be admitted as a full-time scholar
Students of final years of dual degree integrated programmes entitled from the 9th semester
Admitted in AICTE approved Institutions/ University Departments & AICTE approved programs
Number of PG Scholarship limited to AICTE approved intake
exclusions: Candidates admitted in PG programs through management quota
documents_required: Admission proof in AICTE approved program

faqs.question: What is the duration of the scholarship period?
faqs.answer: The Scholarship is tenable for 24 months or for the duration of the course, whichever is lower.

faqs.question: Is there any reservation for EWS?
faqs.answer: AICTE will provide PG scholarship to an additional 10% candidates from EWS category.

faqs.question: What are the various types of leave entitlement during the scholarship period?
faqs.answer: Casual leave: 15 days, Medical leave: Maximum of one month, Maternity leave as per Govt. norms.

faqs.question: What action shall be taken against the students who leave the course in midway?
faqs.answer: The student shall be required to give an undertaking that he/she would not leave the course midway.

faqs.question: Is there any condition for payment of scholarship?
faqs.answer: The Scholarship will be granted on a monthly basis subject to satisfactory academic performance.
